snippet: The two-time champion Novak Djokovic reached the China Open quarterfinals after dismissing Carlos Berlocq of Argentina, 6-1, 6-3.
abstract: Two-time champion Novak Djokovic reaches men's quarterfinals at the China Open tennis tournament; Agnieszka Radwanska advances on the women's side.
lead_paragraph: The two-time champion Novak Djokovic reached the China Open quarterfinals after dismissing Carlos Berlocq of Argentina, 6-1, 6-3.
